criteria.description: Verification that the clinical note meets the minimum required word count
criteria.passCondition: The clinical note contains 100 or more words in total
criteria.failCondition: The clinical note contains fewer than 100 words in total

criteria.description: Verification that the patient's name is included in the note
criteria.passCondition: The patient's name is clearly documented within the note
criteria.failCondition: The patient's name is missing from the note

criteria.description: Verification that the note is properly formatted in JSON
criteria.passCondition: The note is in valid JSON format with proper syntax, including opening and closing braces, quotes around keys, and appropriate use of colons and commas
criteria.failCondition: The note is not in valid JSON format or contains syntax errors

criteria.description: Verification that all required SOAP note sections are present
criteria.passCondition: The note contains all required SOAP sections: Subjective, Objective, Assessment, and Plan
criteria.failCondition: One or more required SOAP sections (Subjective, Objective, Assessment, or Plan) are missing from the note

criteria.description: Verification that basic patient information is included in the subjective section
criteria.passCondition: The subjective section includes patient information with at least name and one additional demographic element (such as age or gender)
criteria.failCondition: The subjective section is missing patient information or contains only the patient's name without additional demographic elements

criteria.description: Verification that the patient's chief complaint is documented
criteria.passCondition: The subjective section includes a clearly stated chief complaint
criteria.failCondition: The subjective section does not include a chief complaint

criteria.description: Verification that objective data is included
criteria.passCondition: The objective section contains at least one category of objective findings (such as physical examination, vital signs, or functional tests)
criteria.failCondition: The objective section is empty or does not contain any objective findings

criteria.description: Verification that a diagnosis is documented
criteria.passCondition: The assessment section includes a clearly stated diagnosis
criteria.failCondition: The assessment section does not include a diagnosis

criteria.description: Verification that a treatment plan is documented
criteria.passCondition: The plan section includes a clearly stated treatment plan
criteria.failCondition: The plan section does not include a treatment plan
